overview: When the Texas Southern Armadillos football team is disqualified for cheating and poor grades, the University is forced to pick from a team that actually goes to school. Will they even win a single game?
tagline: This gang of loners, loonies and losers are about to become something they've never been before... a team.
cast: Scott Bakula|Robert Loggia|Harley Jane Kozak|Larry Miller|Héctor Elizondo
